text:
@FLOTUS Thank You @FLOTUS You're the best First Lady ever.

Please spread the word on this: Tea can cure coronavirus!

"Tea might inhibit proliferation of coronavirus: Taiwan study

"The findings were published by the Journal of Medical Virology on March 22."
